Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires structured out-of-cell programming for adolescents in segregated disciplinary confinement
Summary: Requires structured out-of-cell programming for adolescents in segregated disciplinary confinement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring structured out-of-cell programming for adolescents in segregated disciplinary confinement
